summary: Comprehensive testing of new AI Profile Creator, Public Profile Page, Admin Profiles tab, Admin Settings/SEO Editor, and all existing features. All 43 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified working including the 5-step AI Profile Creator form with GPT-4o AI content generation.
seed_data_creation: Created test profile via AI Profile Creator: SKX79443ED5
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: (1) AI Profile Creator - 5-step multi-form modal accessible via FAB 'Create AI Profile' button, creates profiles with AI-generated bio, LinkedIn headline, strengths, skill gaps, career roadmap, and course recommendation using GPT-4o, (2) Public Profile Page at /profile/{profile_code} displays all AI-generated content with view counter, share/copy buttons, (3) Admin Profiles tab shows Total Profiles (9), Students (4), Freshers (3), Professionals (2) with recent profiles list and view links, (4) Admin Settings tab has full SEO editor with Meta Title (character count), Meta Description, Meta Keywords, Google Analytics ID, Social Media Links, and Save Settings button, (5) Admin Analytics tab shows full conversion funnel, leads trend, most visited pages, traffic sources including AI Profile Creator leads, (6) Admin Courses tab lists courses with status and external view links, (7) Footer has hidden Settings icon linking to /admin.

ai_profile_creator.details: 5-step multi-form modal: Step 1 (Basic Info), Step 2 (Education), Step 3 (Career Goals), Step 4 (Skills & Interests), Step 5 (Final Details). Creates profile with AI-generated content via GPT-4o. Profile code format: SKX{8-char-hex}. Test profile created: SKX79443ED5

public_profile_page.details: Displays at /profile/{profile_code}. Shows: profile name, AI-generated headline, location, view counter, Verified badge, About section with AI bio, Career Goals, Quick Info sidebar (Education, Career Stage, Availability), Interests, Recommended Course with View Courses button, share/copy buttons.

admin_profiles_tab.details: Shows Total Profiles (9), Students (4), Freshers (3), Professionals (2). Recent Profiles list with profile code, email, career stage, target role, view count, and View link.

admin_settings_seo_editor.details: Site Information: Site Name, Tagline, Contact Email, Contact Phone, WhatsApp Number, Address. SEO Settings: Meta Title (with 56/60 character count), Meta Description (119/160 chars), Meta Keywords, Google Analytics ID. Social Media Links: Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube. Save Settings button.

admin_analytics_tab.details: Stats: Total Page Views (87), Unique Visitors (25), Total Leads (66), Conversion Rate (7.6%). Lead Conversion Funnel (New: 61, Converted: 5). Leads Trend (Last 7 Days). Most Visited Pages. Traffic Sources including AI Profile Creator (9 leads).

admin_courses_tab.details: Lists courses: Professional Digital Marketing (4 Months, Active), Advanced AI-Powered Marketing (2 Months, Active). External view links. Note about course content being pre-configured.

fab_floating_actions.details: Main FAB button expands to show 3 options: Find Your Course (Quiz), AI Marketing Lab, Create AI Profile. All buttons have data-testid attributes.

footer_admin_link.details: Hidden Settings icon in footer with data-testid='footer-admin-link' linking to /admin.

test_files: test_skillax_api.py (17 tests): Health, Admin Auth, Leads, Contact, Courses, Blogs, Chatbot, Analytics
test_admin_cms.py (14 tests): Analytics Summary, Lead Conversion, Leads by Source, Top Pages, Page Views, Visitor Tracking, Leads Management, Blog CRUD
test_profiles_settings.py (12 tests): Profile Creation, Duplicate Email Rejection, Public Profile Access, Profile View Count, Admin Profiles, Profile Analytics, Site Settings CRUD, Course Management

new_profile_endpoints: POST /api/profiles - Create student profile with AI content generation
GET /api/profiles/{profile_code} - Get public profile (increments view count)
new_settings_endpoints: GET /api/settings - Get site settings (public for SEO)
